dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle financial uncertainty?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take bold and decisive action to seize opportunities, often taking calculated risks.
Your FarTwin will prioritize caution and stability, avoiding high-risk investments or ventures.

dimensions.label: Analytical Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on data-driven insights and rational analysis to inform decisions.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts and rely on creative, outside-the-box thinking.

dimensions.label: Interpersonal Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be confident and direct in their communication, taking charge of social interactions.
Your FarTwin will prioritize building relationships and working together with others to achieve common goals.

dimensions.label: Financial Priorities
dimensions.description: What will be your top financial focus?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize saving, investing for the future, and maintaining a stable financial foundation.
Your FarTwin will emphasize investing in personal growth, education, and new opportunities.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin learn and absorb new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prefer to learn through abstract concepts, theoretical frameworks, and academic research.
Your FarTwin will focus on hands-on experience, experimentation, and real-world application.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be expressive and honest about their feelings, sharing them openly with others.
Your FarTwin will keep their emotions private, only sharing them with close confidants or when necessary.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize time allocation?

options.description: Your FarTwin will adapt to changing circumstances, allowing for spontaneity and flexibility in their schedule.
Your FarTwin will prioritize organization and routine, creating a strict plan and sticking to it.

dimensions.label: Attention Span
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin focus their attention?

options.description: Your FarTwin will maintain a wide range of interests, exploring multiple topics simultaneously.
Your FarTwin will concentrate on a single topic or task, eliminating distractions and minimizing multitasking.
